Independence 17-year-old who held gun to head of teen is charged "An Independence 17-year-old has been charged with robbery in connection with the violent act of holding a gun to another teen's head, which was widely shared on social media, Jackson County Prosecutor Jean Peters Baker announced today Alexander A. Schrader... faces Robbery 1st Degree, a Class A felony in Missouri." (The range of punishment for a class A felony is Write a comment
